short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable extensions on localhost and restore them when you leave

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LocalGuard automatically manages your Chrome extensions when developing locally:
     • Automatically disables extensions when visiting localhost
     • Remembers which extensions were enabled
     • Automatically restores extensions when leaving localhost
     • Manual control through popup interface
     • Perfect for Next.js App Development
